item.title: Residential Front Yard Parking Within Toronto
item.description: Abstact This study obtained the data of Front Yard Parking in Toronto City from Toronto Open Data Portal. After processing the raw data, ggplot2 is used to make a grouping bar chart. It turns out that Toronto has the most Front Yard type parking lots. At the same time, the ratio of 1 licensed space is the highest among 0-4. The result may have something to do with urban planning.
